column1: '''Eldalië''' is a [[Quenya]] term that refers to the '''[[Elves|Elven-folk]]''' in general
The word can be translated as "people of the Eldar"<ref>{{HM|Guide}}
column2: p. 109</ref> and is composed of ''[[Elda]]'' + ''[[lie]]'' "people".<ref name=arda>{{webcite|author=[[Helge Fauskanger]]|articleurl=http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/quen-eng.htm|articlename=Quettaparma Quenyallo|website=Arda}}</ref>
